summary: This is an email dated August 13, 2019, regarding staffing and overtime at a correctional facility for the dates of August 9-10, 2019. It references a request for information about mandated versus volunteer overtime and includes a comparison of day watch posts. The document appears to be internal administrative communication, possibly related to facility operations during a period of heightened attention.

persons.name: Regional Director Northeast Region
persons.context: The recipient or author of the email regarding staffing and overtime reports at a correctional facility.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: Referenced as the person who will provide information on mandated versus volunteer overtime for the specified dates.

events.title: Friday Staffing and Overtime
events.description: Staffing report for Friday, August 9, 2019, showing 21 posts, 20 staff present, and 6 overtimes from 4pm to 12am. Day watch comparison notes 10 posts (6am-2pm), 36 posts (8am-4pm), and 13 posts (2pm-10pm).

events.title: Saturday Staffing and Overtime
events.description: Staffing report for Saturday, August 10, 2019, showing 19 posts, 18 staff present, and 10 overtimes from 12am to 8am.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 13, 2019, discussing staffing and overtime at a correctional facility for August 9-10, 2019.
It shows specific post counts and overtime figures, indicating heightened or unusual staffing levels during that period.
A request is made for the Warden to provide details on mandated versus volunteer overtime, suggesting administrative scrutiny of staffing practices.
